description: This instrumentation enables HTTP client spans and HTTP client metrics for version 1 of the AsyncHttpClient (AHC) HTTP client.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.http.known-methods
configurations.description: Configures the instrumentation to recognize an alternative set of HTTP request methods. All other methods will be treated as `_OTHER`.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.http.client.capture-request-headers
configurations.description: List of HTTP request headers to capture in HTTP client telemetry.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.http.client.capture-response-headers
configurations.description: List of HTTP response headers to capture in HTTP client telemetry.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.common.peer-service-mapping
configurations.description: Used to specify a mapping from host names or IP addresses to peer services.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.http.client.emit-experimental-telemetry
configurations.description: Enable the capture of experimental HTTP client telemetry. Adds the `http.request.body.size` and `http.response.body.size` attributes to spans, and records `http.client.request.size` and `http.client.response.size` metrics.
